00090         template<typename T = db::base>
00091         class database : private boost::noncopyable
00092         {
00093             T db_;
00094 
00095         public:
00096             database(const db::string& name)
00097             {
00098                 #ifdef SQLITE_WRAPPER_NARROW_STRING
00099                     db_.connect(name);
00100                 #else
00101                     db_.connect(static_cast<const char*>(
00102                         db::detail::w2a(name.c_str())));
00103                 #endif // SQLITE_WRAPPER_NARROW_STRING
00104 
00105                 {
00106                     db::ostringstream s_cr;
00107                     s_cr 
00108                         << DB_TEXT("create table if not exists ") 
00109                         << DB_TEXT("log(id integer primary key autoincrement")
00110                         << DB_TEXT(", date_real real")
00111                         << DB_TEXT(", date_text text")
00112                         << DB_TEXT(", level integer")
00113                         << DB_TEXT(", msg text);");
00114                     db_.execute_ptr(s_cr.str());
00115                 }
00116             }
00117 
00118             T& output_stream() 
00119             { return db_; }
00120 
00121             typedef boost::shared_ptr< database > ptr;
00122         };
00123     }

00125     namespace provider
00126     {
00128         template<typename Buffer>
00129         class basic : private boost::noncopyable
00130         {
00131             basic()
00132                 : boost::noncopyable()
00133             {
00134             }
00135         public:
00136             typedef Buffer buffer_type;
00137 
00138             basic(typename buffer_type::ptr buffer_ptr)
00139                 : boost::noncopyable()
00140                 , indent_(0)
00141                 , buffer_( buffer_ptr )
00142             {
00143             }
00144 
00145             typename buffer_type::ptr get_buffer() const
00146             { return buffer_; }
00147 
00148             void increase_indent()
00149             { ++indent_; }
00150 
00151             void decrease_indent()
00152             { --indent_; }
00153 
00154             size_t indent() const
00155             { return indent_; }
00156 
00157         private:
00159             size_t indent_;
00161             typename buffer_type::ptr buffer_;
00162         };

00166     namespace format
00167     {
00169         class basic
00170         {
00171         private:
00172             basic();
00173             ~basic();
00174 
00175             static db::string get_akt_time()
00176             {
00177 #ifndef BOOST_NO_STD_LOCALE
00178                 return db::detail::to_sql_string(
00179                     boost::posix_time::second_clock::local_time());
00180 #else
00181                 return db::detail::to_sql_string(db::time::time_ce(0));
00182 #endif
00183             }
00184 
00185         public:
00186             template <typename OutputStream>
00187             static void do_format(
00188                 OutputStream& stream
00189                 , size_t indent
00190                 , const db::string& data
00191                 ,   db::log::level lvl = db::log::log_undef)
00192             {
00193                 for (size_t i(0); i<indent; ++i)
00194                     stream << DB_TEXT(' ');
00195                 
00196                 stream << get_akt_time();
00197                 stream << DB_TEXT(" - ");
00198                 stream << lvl;
00199                 stream << DB_TEXT(" - ");
00200                 // Push data.
00201                 stream << data.c_str();
00202                 // Push delimiter (end of line).
00203                 stream << std::endl;
00204             }
00205 
00206             template <typename OutputStream, typename T>
00207             static void do_format(
00208                   OutputStream& stream
00209                 , size_t indent
00210                 , const T& data
00211                 ,   db::log::level lvl = db::log::log_undef)
00212             {
00213                 for (size_t i(0); i<indent; ++i)
00214                     stream << DB_TEXT(' ');
00215 
00216                 stream << get_akt_time();
00217                 stream << DB_TEXT(" - ");
00218                 stream << lvl;
00219                 stream << DB_TEXT(" - ");
00220                 // Push data.
00221                 stream << data;
00222                 // Push delimiter (end of line).
00223                 stream << DB_TEXT('\n');
00224             }
00225 
00226             static db::string decorate_message(const db::string& msg)
00227             { 
00228                 return msg; 
00229                 //return db::string(DB_TEXT("[")) + 
00230                 //  msg + 
00231                 //  db::string(DB_TEXT("]")); 
00232             }
00233 
00234             static db::string decorate_scope_open(const db::string& msg)
00235             { return msg; }
00236 
00237             static db::string decorate_scope_close(const db::string& msg)
00238             { return db::string(DB_TEXT("\\")) + msg; }
00239         };
00240 
00242         class database
00243         {
00244             database();
00245             ~database();
00246 
00247         public:
00248 
00249             template <typename Database, typename T>
00250             static void do_format(
00251                   Database& db_
00252                 , size_t indent
00253                 , const T& data
00254                 ,   db::log::level lvl = db::log::log_undef)
00255             {
00256 #ifndef BOOST_NO_STD_LOCALE
00257                 static boost::posix_time::ptime time_t_epoch(
00258                     boost::gregorian::date(1970, 1, 1));
00259                 boost::posix_time::ptime local_time
00260                     (boost::posix_time::second_clock::local_time());
00261                 string local_time_string(db::detail::to_sql_string(local_time));
00262                 double local_time_double(
00263                     boost::posix_time::time_duration(
00264                         local_time - time_t_epoch).total_seconds());
00265 #else
00266                 time_t_ce local_time(db::time::time_ce(0));
00267                 string local_time_string(db::detail::to_sql_string(local_time));
00268                 double local_time_double(local_time);
00269 #endif
00270 
00271                 db_.execute_ptr((
00272                       db::ins(DB_TEXT("log"))
00273                     % db::field(DB_TEXT("date_real"), local_time_double)
00274                     % db::field(DB_TEXT("date_text"), local_time_string)
00275                     % db::field(DB_TEXT("level"), static_cast<unsigned>(lvl))
00276                     % db::field(DB_TEXT("msg"), db::detail::to_string(data))));
00277             }
00278 
00279             static db::string decorate_message(const db::string& msg)
00280             { 
00281                 return msg; 
00282             }
00283 
00284             static db::string decorate_scope_open(const db::string& msg)
00285             { return msg; }
00286 
00287             static db::string decorate_scope_close(const db::string& msg)
00288             { return db::string(DB_TEXT("\\")) + msg; }
00289         };

00295     template 
00296     <
00297           typename Provider = provider::basic
00298             <
00299                 db::log::buffer::basic 
00300             >
00301         , typename Format = format::basic
00302     >
00303     class base : private boost::noncopyable
00304     {
00306         base() : boost::noncopyable()
00307             , last_level_(db::log::log_undef)
00308         { }
00309 
00310     public:
00312         typedef Provider provider_type;
00314         typedef boost::shared_ptr< provider_type > provider_ptr_type;
00316         typedef Format formatter_type;
00318         typedef base<provider_type, formatter_type> log_type;
00319 
00321         base(const provider_ptr_type& io_provider)
00322             : boost::noncopyable()
00323 #if defined (SQLITE_WRAPPER_USE) && (SQLITE_WRAPPER_USE == 1)
00324             , provider_(io_provider)
00325 #endif
00326             , last_level_(db::log::log_undef)
00327         {
00328         }
00329 
00338         ~base()
00339         {
00340         }
00341 
00342         void increase_indent()
00343         {
00344 #if defined (SQLITE_WRAPPER_USE) && (SQLITE_WRAPPER_USE == 1)
00345             if (provider_)
00346                 provider_->increase_indent();
00347 #endif
00348         }
00349 
00350         void decrease_indent()
00351         {
00352 #if defined (SQLITE_WRAPPER_USE) && (SQLITE_WRAPPER_USE == 1)
00353             if (provider_)
00354                 provider_->decrease_indent();
00355 #endif
00356         }
00357 
00358         base& operator << (const level& data)
00359         {
00360 #if defined (SQLITE_WRAPPER_USE) && (SQLITE_WRAPPER_USE == 1)
00361             last_level_ = data;
00362 #endif
00363             return *this;
00364         }
00365 
00366         template <typename T>
00367         base& operator << (const T& data)
00368         {
00369 #if defined (SQLITE_WRAPPER_USE) && (SQLITE_WRAPPER_USE == 1)
00370             formatter_type::do_format(
00371                   provider_->get_buffer()->output_stream()
00372                 , provider_->indent()
00373                 , data
00374                 , last_level_);
00375 #endif
00376             return *this;
00377         }
00378 
00379     private:
00381         provider_ptr_type provider_;
00382 
00383         level last_level_;
00384     };
00385 
00387     template <typename Log>
00388     class message : private boost::noncopyable
00389     {
00390         Log& base_;
00391         level last_level_;
00392 
00393     public:
00395         typedef Log log_type;
00396 
00397         explicit message(
00398             log_type& _base
00399             , const db::string& msg
00400             , const level lvl = db::log::log_error) 
00401             : boost::noncopyable()
00402             , base_(_base)
00403             , last_level_(lvl)
00404         {
00405 #if defined (SQLITE_WRAPPER_USE) && (SQLITE_WRAPPER_USE == 1)
00406             if (last_level_ <= global_level)
00407                 base_ << last_level_ << 
00408                     log_type::formatter_type::decorate_message(msg); 
00409 #endif
00410         }
00411 
00412         bool operator()(const db::string& msg) const
00413         {
00414 #if defined (SQLITE_WRAPPER_USE) && (SQLITE_WRAPPER_USE == 1)
00415             if (last_level_ <= global_level)
00416                 base_ << last_level_ << 
00417                     log_type::formatter_type::decorate_message(msg);
00418 #endif
00419             return true;
00420         }
00421 
00422         bool operator()(const level& lvl, const db::string& msg) const
00423         {
00424 #if defined (SQLITE_WRAPPER_USE) && (SQLITE_WRAPPER_USE == 1)
00425             if (lvl <= global_level)
00426                 base_ << lvl << 
00427                     log_type::formatter_type::decorate_message(msg);
00428 #endif
00429             return true;
00430         }
00431     };
00432 
00438     template <typename Log>
00439     class scope : private boost::noncopyable
00440     {
00441     public:
00442 
00444         typedef Log log_type;
00445 
00459         explicit scope(
00460               log_type& scope_log
00461             , const db::string& scope_message
00462             , const level lvl = db::log::log_debug)
00463             : boost::noncopyable()
00464 #if defined (SQLITE_WRAPPER_USE) && (SQLITE_WRAPPER_USE == 1)
00465             , log_(scope_log)
00466             , message_(scope_message)
00467             , last_level_(lvl)
00468 #endif
00469         {
00470 #if defined (SQLITE_WRAPPER_USE) && (SQLITE_WRAPPER_USE == 1)
00471             if (last_level_ <= global_level)
00472             {
00473                 log_ << last_level_ <<
00474                     log_type::formatter_type::decorate_scope_open(message_);
00475                 log_.increase_indent();
00476             }
00477 #endif
00478         }
00479 
00488         ~scope()
00489         {
00490 #if defined (SQLITE_WRAPPER_USE) && (SQLITE_WRAPPER_USE == 1)
00491             if (last_level_ <= global_level)
00492             {
00493                 log_.decrease_indent();
00494                 log_ << last_level_ <<
00495                     log_type::formatter_type::decorate_scope_close(message_);
00496             }
00497 #endif
00498         }
00499 
00500     private:
00502         log_type& log_;
00503 
00505         db::string message_;
00506 
00507         level last_level_;
00508     };
